/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars, painted in vibrant hues of red and blue, are scattered along the road, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are looking down upon the city from a great height.
